Description.value: The modlet is intended to add on extra decorative blocks through helper blocks/shape menu. Check me out at https://youtube.com/vedui42 for all my videos, guides and tutorials! Also I stream weekly at https://twitch.tv/vedui42 ... Follow me on https://twitter.com/vedui42 too! Thanks to @Satis for the Lights/doors additions and another hundred++ building shapes in various materials!
